verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> my God,<WH430> I take refuge<WH2620> in you.<WH3467> Save me from all those who pursue<WH7291> me,<WH5337> and deliver me,
lest they tear<WH2963> apart my soul<WH5315> like a lion,<WH738> ripping it in pieces,<WH6561> while there is none to deliver.<WH5337>
Yahweh,<WH3068> my God,<WH430> if I have done<WH6213> this,<WH3426> if there is iniquity<WH5766> in my hands,<WH3709>
if I have rewarded<WH1580> evil<WH7451> to him who was at peace<WH7999> with me<WH2502> (yes, if I have delivered him who without cause<WH7387> was my adversary<WH6887>),

let the enemy<WH341> pursue<WH7291> my soul,<WH5315> and overtake<WH5381> it;<WH2416> yes, let him tread my life down<WH7429> to the earth,<WH776> and lay<WH7931> my glory<WH3519> in the dust.<WH6083> Selah.<WH5542>
Arise,<WH6965> Yahweh,<WH3068> in your anger.<WH639> Lift up<WH5375> yourself against the rage<WH5678> of my adversaries.<WH6887> Awake<WH5782> for me.<WH6680> You have commanded judgment.<WH4941>
Let the congregation<WH5712> of the peoples<WH3816> surround<WH5437> you.<WH7725> Rule over them on high.<WH4791>
Yahweh<WH3068> administers judgment<WH1777> to the peoples.<WH5971> Judge<WH1777> me,<WH3068> Yahweh, according to my righteousness,<WH6664> and to my integrity that is in me.<WH8537>

Oh let the wickedness<WH7451> of the wicked<WH7563> come to an end,<WH1584> but establish<WH3559> the righteous;<WH6662> their minds<WH3629> and hearts<WH3826> are searched<WH974> by the righteous<WH6662> God.<WH430>
My shield<WH4043> is with God,<WH430> who saves<WH3467> the upright<WH3477> in heart.<WH3820>
God<WH430> is a righteous<WH6662> judge,<WH8199> yes,<WH410> a God who has indignation<WH2194> every day.<WH3117>
If a man doesn't<WH7725> relent, he will sharpen<WH3913> his sword;<WH2719> he has bent<WH1869> and strung<WH3559> his bow.<WH7198>
He has also prepared<WH3559> for himself the instruments<WH3627> of death.<WH4194> He makes<WH6466> ready his flaming<WH1814> arrows.<WH2671>
Behold,<WH2254> he travails with iniquity.<WH205> Yes,<WH2029> he has conceived mischief,<WH5999> and brought forth<WH3205> falsehood.<WH8267>
He has<WH3738> dug<WH2658> a hole,<WH953> and has fallen<WH5307> into the pit<WH7845> which he made.<WH6466>
The trouble<WH5999> he causes shall return<WH7725> to his own head.<WH7218> His violence<WH2555> shall come down<WH3381> on the crown of his own head.<WH6936>
I will give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh<WH3068> according to his righteousness,<WH6664> and will sing praise<WH2167> to the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> Most High.<WH5945>
